Class ScreensController

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.views.controllers.ScreensController
public class ScreensController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing and loading different scenes (FXML views) in the application. It handles the caching of previously loaded scenes to optimize performance and ensures scenes are loaded from the correct location when needed.

This class supports:

  • Loading scenes either from cache or by loading the FXML file if it isn't cached.
  • Providing the controller associated with a loaded scene.
  • Clearing the cache of loaded scenes when necessary.

  • Method Details

    • isScenesLoaded

      public boolean isScenesLoaded(Scenes scenes)
      Checks if the specified scene has been loaded recently.
      Parameters:
      scenes - the scene to check
      Returns:
      true if the scene is the last one loaded, false otherwise

    • loadScreen

      public javafx.scene.Parent loadScreen(Scenes scenes) throws IOException
      Loads a screen, either from the cache if caching is enabled or by loading the FXML file.
      Parameters:
      scenes - the scene to load
      Returns:
      the loaded scene's root node
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the FXML file

    • getScenes

      public javafx.scene.Parent getScenes(Scenes scenes)
      Retrieves a scene from the cache.
      Parameters:
      scenes - the scene to retrieve from the cache
      Returns:
      the cached scene's root node
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the scene is not found in the cache

    • getSceneController

      public Object getSceneController(Scenes scenes) throws IOException
      Retrieves the controller associated with a given scene.
      Parameters:
      scenes - the scene for which to retrieve the controller
      Returns:
      the controller of the loaded scene
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the FXML file

    • getLoader

      public javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader getLoader(Scenes scenes)
      Retrieves the FXMLLoader used to load a given scene.
      Parameters:
      scenes - the scene for which to retrieve the FXMLLoader
      Returns:
      the FXMLLoader for the given scene

    • clearCache

      public void clearCache()
      Clears the cache of all loaded scenes.
